prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The company operates three physical stores in the UK, as well as a large online store. Their online presence serves customers in the UK, EU, and Switzerland.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: UK Retailer: Stores and Online Presence
